alert.note: Alert for Mahnomen; Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Norman, Mahnomen and northwestern Becker Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 523 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mahnomen, or 36 miles north of Detroit Lakes, moving southeast at 10 mph. Other strong thunderstorms were located near Ranum in Norman county and near Ogema in Becker county. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mahnomen, Waubun, Naytahwaush, Callaway, Ogema, White Earth and Bejou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
